write up: after sending rq change email we found that csrfkey = csrf token => try our token to attack others -> fail => we think the way that we can change victim's csrfkey => so the csrf token also change we try to inject search => manipulate URL to set cookie rq search => Set-Cookie: LastSearchTerm=hat => we try a way to inject URL we try this payload to set cookie : search=test%0d%0aSet-Cookie:%20csrf=fake%3b%20 %0d%0a = /n, payload:
